responses: You can find detailed information about the admission process on the official website here: [Admissions](https://vidyaacademy.ac.in/admission_details.php?adm_id=5).

patterns: Civil Engineering curriculum
Civil Engineering syllabus
Civil Engineering semester courses
Civil Engineering subjects
CE syllabus
What topics are covered in Civil Engineering?
Can you provide details about Civil Engineering courses?
responses:
Semesters 1 and 2:

In the first year, Civil Engineering students undertake foundational courses, similar to other branches:

- Mathematics I & II
- Physics
- Chemistry
- Engineering Graphics
- Basic Electrical and Electronics Engineering
- Algorithmic Thinking with Python
- Life Skills and Professional Communication
- Health and Wellness
- Engineering Workshops

Semesters 3 to 8:

Core subjects for Civil Engineering include:

- Mechanics of Solids
- Fluid Mechanics
- Surveying
- Geotechnical Engineering
- Structural Analysis
- Hydraulics and Hydraulic Machinery
- Environmental Engineering
- Design of Concrete Structures
- Transportation Engineering
- Water Resources Engineering
- Construction Management
- Advanced Structural Design
- Elective Courses
- Project Work and Seminars

patterns: library
Does the college have a library?
Where is the library located?
What are the library timings?
What resources are available in the library?
Can I borrow books from the library?
responses: Yes, the college has a library. The College Library comprises a Central Library along with various Departmental Libraries, collectively housing an expanding collection of over 37,520 volumes and 13,386 titles across diverse fields, including Engineering, Technology, and Sciences. It also has an exclusive collection in both Malayalam and English literatures, encouraging students to cultivate reading habits. For more details, visit: [Central Library](https://vidyaacademy.ac.in/department_details.php?dep_id=25).

patterns: placement

placement?
Tell me about the college placements.
What is the placement record?
What companies visit for placements?
Is there any placement training provided?
responses: The college has a strong placement record. There are many training programs designed to enhance the capabilities of students to meet the expectations of the industry. During the second, third, and fourth years, one hour per week is dedicated to co-curricular activities, with special focus on placement-oriented training aimed at the overall development of the students. For more details, visit: [Placements](https://vidyatcklmr.ac.in/department_details.php?dep_id=24).

patterns: Semesters 1 and 2 courses for CSE
first year subjects for Cse
Semesters 3 to 8 courses for cse
Computer Science core subjects
CSE syllabus
What are the elective subjects in CSE?
Can you provide details about the CSE curriculum?
responses:
Semesters 1 and 2:

In the first year, students across all engineering branches undertake foundational courses, including:

- Mathematics I & II
- Physics
- Chemistry
- Engineering Graphics
- Basic Electrical and Electronics Engineering
- Algorithmic Thinking with Python
- Life Skills and Professional Communication
- Health and Wellness
- Engineering Workshops

These courses establish a solid foundation in essential engineering principles.

Semesters 3 to 8:

From the third semester onwards, the curriculum becomes more specialized, focusing on core subjects related to Computer Science and Engineering. While the exact subjects may vary based on the university's curriculum updates, typical courses include:

- Discrete Computational Structures
- Data Structures and Algorithms
- Computer Organization and Architecture
- Operating Systems
- Database Management Systems
- Theory of Computation
- Software Engineering
- Computer Networks
- Compiler Design
- Artificial Intelligence
- Machine Learning
- Web Technologies
- Cyber Security
- Project Work and Seminars

responses: The college provides a variety of sports facilities, including a large playground, and courts for various sports like football, basketball, volleyball, and badminton. There are also athletics facilities and opportunities to participate in inter-college competitions.

patterns: about vidya
about VAST_TC
about college
vidya
VAST_TC
What is the history of Vidya Academy?
What facilities are available at Vidya Academy?
responses: Vidya Academy of Science and Technology Technical Campus (VAST TC), one of the top 10 Engineering colleges in Trivandrum and leading institution in the state was established in August 2013 with the aim of providing outcome-based education to students of engineering and technology. An experiential mission statement aligned to a futuristic vision holds the entire institution and the stakeholders together in the continuous pursuit of excellence. In order to achieve the education objectives, scaling up the eco and infrastructures, vitalizing teaching-learning structures and resources, and engineering of proactive procedures and practices are instituted, as continuously evolving governance measures. Vidya Academy of Science and Technology Technical Campus offers to its students, value-based education founded on fundamentals and core competence, research orientation, and social and life skills.[Vidya](https://vidyatcklmr.ac.in/index.php)

responses: ktu website link.[Ktu](https://www.ktu.edu.in/).

patterns: academics
What academic programs are offered?
Are there any academic resources available?
responses: Vidya Academy of Science and Technology (VAST) offers a range of academic programs designed to provide students with a strong foundation in the field of engineering and technology. The institution is affiliated with APJ Abdul Kalam Technological University (KTU) and offers undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in various disciplines.You can find information about academics here: [Academics](https://vidyatcklmr.ac.in/page.php?page=3).

patterns: resources

Can you provide a list of resources?
responses: Vidya Academy of Science and Technology (VAST) offers a variety of resources to support students in their academic and personal development. Some of the key resources available at Vidya include:You can find various resources here: [Resources](https://vidyatcklmr.ac.in/index.php#).

patterns: naac
What is NAAC?
Why is NAAC accreditation important?
responses: Vidya Academy of Science and Technology (VAST) is accredited by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC), which is an autonomous body established by the University Grants Commission (UGC) to assess and accredit institutions of higher education in India. NAAC accreditation is a mark of quality and signifies that an institution meets the required academic, infrastructural, and administrative standards set by the council.Find details about NAAC here: [NAAC](https://vidyatcklmr.ac.in/page.php?page=110).

patterns: Established date
When was Vidya Academy established?
What is the establishment date of Vidya Academy?
When did Vidya Academy start?
When was Vidya Academy of Science and Technology founded?
When was Vidya Academy of Science and Technology Technical Campus established?
responses: The Vidya Academy of Science and Technology in Thrissur, Kerala began functioning in August 2003. The Vidya Academy of Science and Technology Technical Campus in Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala was established in 2013.

responses: Er. K.R. Brahmadathan is the founder Executive Director of the Vidya International Charitable Trust (VICT), which established the Vidya Academy of Science and Technology in Thrissur. Dr. D Balakrishnan is the founder Academic Director.

patterns: Tell me about Vyuha and the technical fest.
What is Vyuha and when is it conducted?
Details about Vidya College art fest and technical fest.
When does the art fest Vyuha happen?
When is the technical fest conducted?
What events are included in the technical fest?
responses:
Vidya College Art Fest & Technical Fest Overview:

1. Vyuha – Art Fest
Name: Vyuha
Started in: 2023
Frequency: Conducted annually during the even semester.
Highlights:
- Showcases student talent in various art forms, including painting, dance, music, and drama.
- Includes cultural performances, creative exhibitions, and interactive workshops.
- Encourages participation from all departments, fostering creativity and teamwork.

2. Technical Fest
Frequency: Conducted during the even semester.
Highlights:
- Includes coding competitions, hackathons, paper presentations, and project expos.
- Workshops and seminars conducted by industry experts to enhance technical knowledge.
- Provides a platform for students to showcase innovative ideas and technical expertise.

For more details about Vyuha, visit the official website: [Vyuha Website](https://vidyavyuha.in/)

patterns: What are the college timings?
When does the college start and end?
Tell me the college hours.
What is the timing of classes in Vidya Academy?
When do classes start and finish?
responses: The college timings are from 9:00 AM to 12:50 PM and 1:30 PM to 4:00 PM. The college operates from Monday to Saturday, with the second and fourth Saturdays being holidays.

responses: The approximate number of students in Vidya Academy is around 1,200 to 1,500.
